Subject: AD Group permission analysis report
Description:
Can we get a report on the access being provided in the environment via AD groups.
Can we identify usage of specific AD groups within on-Prem/Cloud applications in the environment.
What_We_Know__c:
+++++
2025_0515:
+++++
The plan is to incorporate those requirements into the 4-day O&RM service that Eevabits will deliver. We will also do a separate SOW for the AD Recovery engagement, that Netwrix will deliver. 
+++++
Next_Steps__c:
1. The Professional Services team will schedule a call with Ashish Sharma and other stakeholders to finalize the scope of the request and gather necessary details for the Statement of Work (SOW).  
2. The Professional Services team will draft the SOW and provide a quotation for review and approval by Ashish Sharma and Tony Romero.  
3. Ashish Sharma and Tony Romero will review and approve the SOW and quotation to proceed with the project.  
4. Once the SOW is signed, the Professional Services team will begin work on the project to deliver the requested report.
